name: Fiesta Cabbage
utensils: Very large nonstick skillet or wok

instructions.en: Cut kielbasa on the bias into 1/4-inch slices and brown in skillet. Remove and reserve drippings.
instructions.sk: Nakrájajte klobásu šikmo na 1/4-palcové plátky a opečte na panvici. Vyberte a odložte výpek.
instructions.ja: キルバサを斜めに1/4インチの厚さに切り、フライパンで焼き色をつけます。取り出して油を残します。

instructions.en: Add butter to skillet. Sauté onion and green pepper in drippings and butter over medium-high heat for 3 minutes.
instructions.sk: Pridajte maslo do panvice. Opražte cibuľu a zelenú papriku vo výpeku a masle na stredne vysokom ohni 3 minúty.
instructions.ja: フライパンにバターを加えます。中高温で玉ねぎとピーマンを残った油とバターで3分間炒めます。

instructions.en: Stir in cabbage, sausage, tomatoes, salt and pepper. Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes or until cabbage is tender.
instructions.sk: Primiešajte kapustu, klobásu, paradajky, soľ a korenie. Prikryte a varte na miernom ohni 15 minút alebo kým kapusta nezmäkne.
instructions.ja: キャベツ、ソーセージ、トマト、塩、コショウを加えて混ぜます。蓋をして弱火で15分間、またはキャベツが柔らかくなるまで調理します。

instructions.en: Uncover during the last 5 minutes to allow some liquid to evaporate if needed.
instructions.sk: V prípade potreby odkryte posledných 5 minút, aby sa odparila časť tekutiny.
instructions.ja: 必要に応じて最後の5分間は蓋を取り、液体を蒸発させます。

notes: Makes 6 servings. Can be frozen. *Any kielbasa or smoked sausage with no sugar added can be used.
